name: barracuda
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large tropical sea fish with sharp teeth, that eats other fish and can attack people
Global_Pics/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
US disapproving a person who does business in a way that shows they only think about their own advantage, even if this harms others: In the world of high finance, you have to keep an eye on the barracudas.
